landing.title: Conquer the Peaks of
landing.description: Embark on unforgettable mountain adventures across Azerbaijan's stunning landscapes. Earn unique regional achievement badges as you explore the majestic Caucasus peaks.

activities.title: Choose Your Adventure
activities.description: From challenging summit climbs to serene cultural explorations, find the perfect mountain experience for your skill level.

achievements.title: Collect Regional Badges
achievements.description: Each region of Azerbaijan has its own unique cultural symbol. Complete trips and challenges to earn exclusive achievement badges representing the heritage of each area.

levels.title: Level Up Your Journey
levels.description: Every trip you complete, every summit you conquer, and every challenge you overcome earns you points. As you progress, unlock new levels and exclusive rewards tied to Azerbaijan's rich cultural heritage.

cta.title: Ready to Explore Azerbaijan's Mountains?
cta.description: Join thousands of adventurers discovering the beauty of the Caucasus. Sign up today and start earning your first achievement badge.

trips.title: Mountain Trips
trips.noTripsDescription: Try adjusting your filters or search terms.

achievements.title: Achievement Badges
achievements.description: Earn unique badges representing Azerbaijan's six regions. Each badge celebrates the cultural heritage and natural beauty of its region.

reviews.title: Traveler Reviews
reviews.description: Read authentic experiences from fellow adventurers who have explored Azerbaijan's mountains.

about.title: Discover AzMountain
about.description: We are passionate mountaineers and cultural enthusiasts dedicated to sharing the beauty of Azerbaijan's peaks with the world.
about.mission: Our mission is to make mountain tourism accessible while preserving the rich cultural heritage of each region.

values.title: What Drives Us Forward
values.description: Our core values shape every trip we curate and every experience we create for our community.
values.safetyDesc: Your safety is our top priority on every adventure
values.cultureDesc: We honor and preserve local traditions

symbols.title: The Heart of Our Achievement System
symbols.description: Each region of Azerbaijan has its own unique cultural symbol that represents centuries of heritage, tradition, and natural beauty.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Join our community of adventurers and discover the magic of Azerbaijan's mountains. Your first achievement badge awaits.

footer.description: Discover the breathtaking mountain landscapes of Azerbaijan. From the majestic Caucasus peaks to the ancient trails of Karabakh, embark on adventures that reward your spirit.
footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to get the latest mountain adventures and exclusive offers.
